item.title: HPCA Deets
item.description: #hebbian #phd [[2024-02-07]] An extension to [[Ojas Rule]], pulling the principle of extracting the main direction from the data, out into the space for more than just one neuron at a time.

item.title: Ojas Rule
item.description: #phd #hebbian [[2024-02-07]] An addition to the basic [[List of Hebbian Weight Update Rules#Simple Hebbian Learning Rule|hebbian]] learning rule that adds in the y to the subtracted term.
